myData.name: Maroš
myData.school: Faculty of Informatics and Information Technologies, STU in Bratislava

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am 23 years old, I tutor mathematics and programming...
about.detailedIntro: My name is Maroš Bednár and I am a Master's student at FIIT STU in Bratislava, where I focus on IT and programming. I have been tutoring for 6 years, specializing in IT, mathematics, and personal development. In addition to my studies, I have worked for over 3 years as a programmer in web technologies, mobile applications, and games.
about.specialFocus: Come discover the beauty of mathematics, programming, and personal skill development! I look forward to collaborating with you.

services.title: Services
services.description: I offer tutoring in mathematics and computer science...

mainBenefits.title: Individual Approach and Learning Psychology
mainBenefits.text: Every student is unique. I tailor lessons to the way you best absorb the material, monitor your thinking, and seek the most suitable methods. I help manage stress and prepare you for exams with an emphasis on mental well-being.

mainBenefits.title: Time Management and Effective Learning
mainBenefits.text: For students who want to boost their efficiency, I offer proven techniques for effective learning and time management. We will learn not only what to study but also how to study so that every moment is productive.

mainBenefits.title: Experience and Results
mainBenefits.text: I have over 1000 tutoring hours and numerous satisfied students whom I have prepared for entrance exams, MONITOR, graduation, and other challenging tests.

mainBenefits.title: Quality Preparation with Practical IT Projects
mainBenefits.text: For IT students, I offer practical projects such as creating websites (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, VueJS) and server technologies (Python, Java, SQL) – an excellent preparation for a future career.

mainBenefits.title: Flexibility: Online and In-person
mainBenefits.text: I offer tutoring both online and in-person, with individual and group lessons at competitive prices. Group lessons promote collaboration, which is important for future employment.

mainBenefits.title: Customized Materials and Regular Progress Updates
mainBenefits.text: I create lesson notes for each student and regularly update parents on progress. I assess knowledge through regular tests.

services.specializationText: Mathematics (from elementary to university), Informatics (elementary, secondary, higher education, and practical experience), Programming languages (C, C++, C#, Java, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Dart, SQL, Git), Web development (HTML, CSS, VueJS, Angular), Mobile development (Flutter), Office tools (MS Office), Creative tools (Imagine, Scratch, Minecraft, Roblox, Unity).

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: I offer tutoring in mathematics and computer science...

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: You can contact me at any time via email or phone...
contact.textMe: If you're interested, contact me at

trialLesson.name: Trial Lesson
trialLesson.info: If my profile hasn't convinced you enough, I offer you a completely free trial lesson.

standardLesson.name: Standard Lesson
standardLesson.info: With an individual approach, I'll explain everything you need.

discountOffer.name: Special Offer
discountOffer.discountInfo: Pay for 10 lessons and save 50€! This package is ideal for determined students who want to improve over the long term. Lesson schedules will be arranged separately.

groupLesson.name: Group Lesson
groupLesson.info: If you want to save, I offer an attractive group lesson for you and your friends. Contact me for more information.

items.name: Richard Á.
items.review: Thank you very much for helping us find someone with whom my son enjoys mathematics and always looks forward to tutoring. Maroš is great, friendly, and patient; the material is explained clearly and comprehensibly. We look forward to long-term cooperation!
items.tutorResponse: Thank you very much, I'm always happy to help ;)

items.name: Jozef B.
items.review: Thanks to Maroš, I passed the test on my first try. Thanks a lot. I definitely recommend him, and I'll reach out for the next test.
items.tutorResponse: Thank you for the reference :) I'm happy to help again next time.
